name: Languages
description:
Fragments of language depict the confusion and 'glitches' when we speak language, since the language itself fragmented, rather than singular. We (bilingual), not only speak two different languages, but also different codes to the different circles: colleagues, family, friends, NFTs community, and so on. We often do a code-swithcing (which often produce a confusing experience) and code-mixing (glitches) in our daily conversations.

The piece is a part of "Fragmented Self" series.

Oil Digital Painting
PNG 4000 x 6000 px
